de.htwg_konstanz.ebus.wholesaler.demo
Class SplitCustomerOrderAction

java.lang.Object
  de.htwg_konstanz.ebus.wholesaler.demo.SplitCustomerOrderAction
All Implemented Interfaces:
IAction
public class SplitCustomerOrderAction
extends java.lang.Object
implements IAction

The ProductListAction loads all available products from the database.

After loading, the action puts all products into an List-Object and makes them available for the corresponding view (JSP-Page) via the HTTPSession.

Author:
tdi

execute

public java.lang.String execute(HttpServletRequest request,
                                HttpServletResponse response,
                                java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> errorList)
The execute method is automatically called by the dispatching sequence of the ControllerServlet.

Specified by:
execute in interface IAction
Parameters:
request - the HttpServletRequest-Object provided by the servlet engine
response - the HttpServletResponse-Object provided by the servlet engine
errorList - a Stringlist for possible error messages occured in the corresponding action
Returns:
the redirection URL

accepts

public boolean accepts(java.lang.String actionName)
Each action itself decides if it is responsible to process the corrensponding request or not. This means that the ControllerServlet will ask each action by calling this method if it is able to process the incoming action request, or not.

Specified by:
accepts in interface IAction
Parameters:
actionName - the name of the incoming action which should be processed
Returns:
true if the action is responsible, else false
